name: Auer Media & Entertainment Corp.
description: Founded in 2001 as mobile VAS provider.
overview:
Total Capital: NTD105 million Number of Employees: over 130 staffs Company Locations: Taipei ,Kaohsiung and Beijing
(Head office is based in Taipei. Established Game Development Department in Kaohsiung in 2006. Beijing office is just launched this June.) More than 200 mobile VAS are services / games delivered and executed on Major Telecom Operator in Asia Regions.

Through the combination of technology and entertainment, we hope to provide the public with more convenient and innovative digital-content services so as to enrich everyone’s life. In an era of digital confluence, Auer wishes to play a role of integration and innovation in a bid to digitalize distribution channels and bring convenience to consumers so that entertainment becomes ubiquitous.
